entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with drizzle ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
